name: Camera Bag Companion (Full Color, Softcover Book)
description:
Take your Mamatography on the go with this visual guide book by Vicky Scesa.

Photo Basics & Beyond is a simple, FULL COLOR 7"x7" guide that fits snuggly in your camera bag (or diaper bag).

Topics Include: Camera settings such as Apertures aka Fstops, Shutter Speeds, ISO, Lenses, Flash Basics and Digital Photo Files. 

All this information is sorted in a pretty-little, readable 20 pager that is a far cry from your camera's manual that's still in the box!

All purchases are safely placed using Pay Pal.
Books ordered here are shipped within 10 business days.

Photo Basics and Beyond is a publication by Vicky Scesa ©2013, All Rights Reserved.

For orders outside the US, please contact vicky@mamatographylessons.com

name: Boudoir Camera Strap Cover <3
description:
Photography meets Form, Function, & Fashion with the NEW Boudoir Camera Strap Cover! Lux materials consists of Champagne Satin, Rose Lace with a Gold Zipper accent.

This couture, camera strap cover will have you shooting in sexy style! 
Whether you're a pro or a "Mamatographer", you'll never have to compromise fashion for comfort with the ease of a quick design change that ZIPS!

Camera strap covers are great for event photographers who have to dress the part for weddings or any high end gathering where fashion is a concern.

Comfort is key when you are carrying anything of weight on your shoulders. Our strap covers are double lined in the shoulder area for long term support on pain prone areas for shooters.

Each strap boasts:

-Zippers that Separate (no need to unhook your strap to change looks)

-Concealed Double Padding

& Memory Card Pockets

CUSTOM ORDERS BY REQUEST!

DISCLAIMER

Fabric colors may vary slightly from photos. Textile patterns are limited and may be substituted with notice if unavailable. Custom orders are subject to additional fees. 

International Shipping available with additional fees.

name: Local Photo Basics Group Workshops
description:
Saturday Photo Basics classes are coming back in South Florida!

Learn all you ever wanted to know about photography with Mamatography™ Photo Workshops by Vicky Scesa.

Photo Basics Topics include:

-Camera Settings
-Portraits
-Lighting
& MORE!

Workshop's are 2 hours long and will be held in varied outdoor locations in South Florida. 

The Fall Lineup includes:

The Bonnet House Museum & Gardens, Ft Lauderdale
on Sat, Jan. 4th, 2014. 10am-12noon

*NOTE that admission cost to the Gardens is included in your workshop purchase.

Babies under the age of 9 months are welcome to attend at your discretion for some portions of classes, they'll make perfect little models! 
Please inquire with Vicky about baby models.

This course curriculum includes printable lesson plans to be discussed at the start of the session followed by SHOOTING, YAY!! and constructive critiquing throughout with lots of HOW TO tips.

Ready to reserve your lesson? Just add this item to your cart. Vicky will receive an immediate message that you've made a purchase and she will respond promptly via email to set up your session(s).

You may also send a message to Vicky through the contact page on this site. Please include your full name, Skype username, email and camera model if applicable.

All purchases are safely placed using Pay Pal.

options.name: The Bonnet House Museum & Gardens, Ft Lauderdale-Sat, Jan. 4th, 2014. 10am-12noon

name: Host a South Florida Photo Workshop Party
description:
Play hostess to a 2 hour Mamatography™ Photo Workshops Party. Join in with other creative Mama's at your location and FINALLY learn how to use that camera of yours! Or take your photography to the next level and learn such skills as lighting and editing using Lightroom & Photoshop.

This special rate is for up to 10 Mama's, meaning once you pool your funds, you'll get 2 hrs of LIFE-LONG photo knowledge for just $30 per person!

*Please note that to host a Photo Workshop Party you must have a minimum of 8 participants or meet the price difference of the class cost.

Locations Include Palm Beach, Broward, N. Miami-Dade & S. Martin Counties

This workshop will cover the basics of photography and using your camera's PLUS practical shooting with props. All camera models are welcome.
 
Babies under the age of 9 months are welcome to attend at your discretion for some portions of classes, they'll make perfect little models!
Please inquire with Vicky about baby models.

This course curriculum includes printable lesson plans to be discussed at the start of the session followed by SHOOTING, YAY!! and constructive critiquing throughout with lots of HOW TO tips.

Ready to reserve your lesson? Just add this item to your cart. Vicky will receive an immediate message that you've made a purchase and she will respond promptly via email to set up your session(s). 

You may also send a message to Vicky through the contact page on this site. Please include your full name, Skype username, email and camera model if applicable.

All purchases are safely placed using Pay Pal.

name: Photo Basics Webinar
description:
This 1 hr One-On-One Photo Basics Webinar is designed to introduce you to the VAST techniques your camera has to offer. ALL CAMERA ARE MODELS WELCOME.

**This course includes a Self-Print Photo Basics & Beyond ebook**

Topics will include:
Shooting for good "exposures", Depth of Field, Apertures, Shutter Speeds, ISO, using your flash PLUS lots of Q&A!

Ready to reserve your lesson? Just add this item to your cart. Vicky will receive an immediate message that you've made a purchase and she will respond promptly via email to set up your session(s).

You may also send a message to Vicky through the contact page on this site. Please include your full name, email and camera model if applicable.

All purchases are safely placed using Pay Pal.

name: Local Private Workshops
description:
Learn Photography in South Florida with Mamatography™ Photo Workshops by Vicky Scesa. This one-on-one workshop option allows you to maximize your learning experience.

This 1, 2hr session will focus on Camera & Photo Basics or advanced techniques which will be discussed before your scheduled class.

Lessons include a structured yet FUN curriculum consisting of camera basics, general photo concepts including portraits, landscapes, etc., Using Flash, editing photos with software such as Photoshop and MORE.

Have a specific learning need? Contact Vicky with any creative questions!

This course curriculum includes a printed lesson plan to be discussed at your session.

It is recommended that you download a copy of the Photo Basics & Beyond ebook prior to attending the class. The ebook is available on this site under the "Books" tab.

Lessons are offered on location throughout South Florida and will be decided on upon booking. (Mileage fees apply for distances greater than 20 miles from Delray Beach)

Ready to reserve your lesson? Just add this item to your cart. Vicky will receive an immediate message that you've made a purchase and she will respond promptly via email to set up your session(s).

You may also send a message to Vicky through the contact page on this site. Please include your full name, email and camera model if applicable & your dates of availability.

All purchases are safely placed using Pay Pal.

name: Photoshop Basics I Webinar
description:
Learn the basics of Photoshop with this 1 hour one-on-one webinar.

Topics include:

The Photoshop Interface & Tools
Layers
Cropping & Sizing
Color Correction
Retouching & Airbrushing Basics
Saving and Organizing your photo files

This course curriculum includes a printable lesson plan.

name: Photoshop Webinar Series
description:
Learn the basics of Photoshop & Photoshop Elements with this 3-1 hour series course designed to elevate your digital photo processing skills.

Topics include:

Cropping & Sizing
Color Correction
Retouching & Airbrushing
Saving and Organizing your photo files

This course curriculum includes a printable lesson plan to be discussed at the first session followed by HOMEWORK, YAY!! and constructive critiquing at each session with lots of HOW TO tips.

You should own or have a trial version of Photoshop or Elements installed on your computer prior to attending.

Ready to reserve your lesson? Just add this item to your cart. Vicky will receive an immediate message that you've made a purchase and she will respond promptly via email to set up your session(s). 

Webinar lessons will take place by means of Anymeeting.com -a web conferencing service that works within your internet browser, no downloading or account setup needed. You will receive a link by email to join the webinar prior to attending.

For the most efficient webinar service, you need to have a webcam already installed and a fast internet connection in order to screen share this Photoshop lesson.

Questions? Send a message to Vicky through the contact page on this site. Please include your full name, email software type and camera model if applicable.

All purchases are safely placed using Pay Pal.

name: Photo Mentoring Webinar
description:
This Photo Mentoring Webinar session is available for Mamatographers who's learning needs exceed that of the "Basics".

In these sessions, you will have an open playing field to customize the information you are looking to learn. Here, Vicky Scesa will answer your questions and fill in the blanks where you might be struggling with technical issues regarding your camera or editing and retouching your photos. This includes screen sharing sessions using Photoshop and Lightrooom.

This workshop will take place on AnyMeeting.com. Once reserved, you will receive an email invite to attend your webinar.

Ready to reserve your lesson? Just add this item to your cart. Vicky will receive an immediate message that you've made a purchase and she will respond promptly via email to set up your session(s).

You may also send a message to Vicky through the contact page on this site. Please include your full name, email and camera model if applicable.

name: Local Private Workshop Series
description:

By taking lessons on an ongoing basis you will have the ability to retain knowledge faster while having the benefit of a custom lesson plan with this one-on-one option with Vicky. LESSONS ARE IN ENGLISH.

This option is for a 3 part 2hr per session series {a total of 6 hours of photography education}.

name: Photo Basics Public Webinar
description:
Join me, Vicky Scesa, for a 1 hour Camera Basics Webinar open to Anyone, Anywhere on Wednesday nights from 7-8:15pm United States Eastern Standard Time. We will meet via video messaging. 

This course includes a Self-Print Photo Basics & Beyond ebook which will be sent to your email address. PLUS a lesson plan to follow along at the workshop.

We will cover topics such as Basic Camera Settings to achieve proper "exposures". Settings include Apertures aka Fstops, ISO's & Shutter Speeds. PLUS brief discussion on Lenses and using Flash!

LIVE Q&A will take place during an additional 15 minutes added to the end of the session.

Ready to reserve your lesson? Just add this item to your cart. Vicky will receive an immediate message that you've made a purchase and she will respond promptly via email to set up your session(s).

You will receive a link to connect for the webinar shortly following your purchase.

You may also send a message to Vicky through the contact page on this site. Please include your full name, location & time zone, email and camera model if applicable.

All purchases are safely placed using Pay Pal.

description:
